category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_Material_Symbol_Classification_IDs
preference.preference_description: Specifies the Material classification IDs for which Symbol attribute is mandatory. These are default values: 5.1.a 5.1.b 5.3
